sentence.Network_en: Nelson Piquet, three times world champion, was grievously injured.
sentence.Network_cn: 三度获得世界冠军的尼尔森·皮奎特受了重伤。

sentence.Network_en: Birds, sea-life and the coastline all suffered grievously.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸟类、海洋生物及沿海生物均受到严重影响。

sentence.Network_en: The Irish and Bristol Channels were closed or grievously obstructed.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱尔兰海峡和布里斯托尔海峡或遭受封锁,或受到了严重阻碍.

Final Fantasy VI- Darkness and Starlight ... ... feral adj. 野生的 grievously adv. 让人悲伤地 sprint n. 疾跑.
《红字》第二章_新沪江英语网_英语学习门户... ... hussy 轻佻的女子 grievously 可叹地;难忍受地 merciful 仁慈的,慈悲的.
双语小说连载:《董贝父子》第14章... ... grieve for v. 哀悼 adv. grievously 令人悲伤地；极其痛苦地 n. grief 悲痛；忧伤；不幸.

list.abs: Iago . What are you here that cry so grievously ?, 伊阿古你是什麽人 , 在这儿叫喊得这样凄惨?
despite his newfound power bestowed by the dark side of the Force , Anakin was grievously wounded in the fight .尽管原力的黑暗面赐给了阿纳金新的力量，他还是在战斗中身受重伤。
美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... grand theft 重偷窃罪 grievously sinful 罪孽深重 grievance 不满,冤情.
fail gravely 严重地失败fail grievously 严重地失败fail habitually 常败

entry.tran: 极其严重的；令人担忧的
entry.def: If you describe something such as a loss as grievous, you mean that it is extremely serious or worrying in its effects.

example.ex: Their loss would be a grievous blow to our engineering industries...
example.tran: 失去它们将会是对我们工程行业的一个沉重打击。

example.ex: Mr Morris said the victims had suffered from a very grievous mistake.
example.tran: 莫里斯先生说遇难者因为一个极其严重的失误而遭遇不幸。

entry.tran: 剧烈的；极痛苦的；疼痛难耐的
entry.def: A grievous injury to your body is one that causes you great pain and suffering.

example.ex: He survived in spite of suffering grievous injuries.
example.tran: 尽管身受重伤，他还是活下来了。

sentences.sentence: "the resolute but unbroken Germany, grievously wounded but far from destruction, was able to lay the firm foundations for military revival"

auth_sentence.content: She saw that she'd been grievously wronged by the Welfare Department.
auth_sentence.res_content: She saw that she'd been grievously wronged by the Welfare Department.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She saw that she'd been grievously wronged by the Welfare Department.

auth_sentence.content: Abbate had left his safe position and run to apply tourniquets and carry out the screaming, grievously wounded men.
auth_sentence.res_content: Abbate had left his safe position and run to apply tourniquets and carry out the screaming, grievously wounded men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Abbate had left his safe position and run to apply tourniquets and carry out the screaming, grievously wounded men.

sentences.en: Having suffered grievously from biological weapons attacks in the past, China supports work that helps comprehensively to strengthen the effectiveness of the convention. It has actively participated in the work of drawing up a Protocol of the Ad Hoc Group of States Parties to the BWC established in 1994, and has made contributions to the progress of the negotiations on the Protocol.
sentences.cn: 中国在历史上也曾深受生物武器之害。中国支持全面加强《禁止生物武器公约》有效性的工作，积极参加了于1994年设立的公约缔约国特设工作组有关制定《公约》议定书的工作，并为议定书的谈判取得进展作出了贡献。
